rows.label: qst200416_msg0001
rows.name:
Punin, tell me. Is it true you're
involved with the Bloody Lobsters?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0002
rows.name:
That is gross misunderstanding!
It actually opposite! Punin
fearful for own life!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0003
rows.name: ...Explain.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0004
rows.name:
There is plot in place to get rid
of me, to make sure dark secrets
of ex- Chairman Bahn stay secret.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0005
rows.name:
And so, Bloody Lobsters get employed,
and life of Punin now in danger!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0006
rows.name:
Right, I gotcha. It's not that
you hired them, it's that
you're their next target...

rows.label: qst200416_msg0007
rows.name:
Right! Exactly! Punin not
sleep a wink from stress!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0008
rows.name:
Is possible that friends wish
to find Bloody Lobsters?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0009
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0010
rows.name: In that case, please guard Punin!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0011
rows.name:
Assassins come to kill Punin for
sure, then friends can capture them!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0012
rows.name: You volunteer to act as bait?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0013
rows.name:
It seems like a good idea,
but also kinda dangerous.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0014
rows.name:
It will be fine, so
long as I am here...

rows.label: qst200416_msg0015
rows.name: And, hopefully, you Drivers as well?

rows.label: qst200416_msg0016
rows.name:
You know it, Vasara! We'll be
there with bells on, and we'll
keep Punin safe as anything!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0017
rows.name:
Life of Punin already threatened,
so act as decoy not big deal!

rows.label: qst200416_msg0018
rows.name: Awesome, sounds like a plan.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0019
rows.name:
Me think Bloody Lobsters most
likely come in the night.

rows.label: qst200416_msg0020
rows.name:
Please assemble in front
of den of Punin on Salvage
Deck at dead of night!
